answers.answer: All medical services and medicines necessary for the treatment of COVID-19 are covered by the FNUASS for diagnosed persons in Romania, regardless of their insurance status.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: People in Romania showing COVID-19 symptoms can receive remote consultations from their family doctor or a specialist doctor.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: Medical services are provided in evaluation centers for persons with confirmed COVID-19 (mild or moderate symptoms, at least 2 risk factors, not requiring oxygen therapy), without needing a referral note.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: The "Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation" service helps patients who continue to experience symptoms for a long period after having COVID-19, even after a mild form of the disease.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: Patients with moderate or severe respiratory insufficiency after COVID-19 can benefit from continuous oxygen administration devices like oxygen concentrators, with details on obtaining them presented in the 'Medical devices chapter'.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Medical devices chapter'.

answers.answer: Patients with post-COVID-19 conditions can benefit from physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy, upon the recommendation of doctors from cardiology and pneumology specialties.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: Post-COVID-19 physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy services are covered by the health insurance system if the offering doctors work in clinics contracted with the health insurance house.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: You can get a COVID-19 vaccination at family medicine offices in Bucharest; a list is available for download on the website.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Addresses where you can get covid vaccination in Bucharest'.

answers.answer: The information is contained in the "Guide on the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine in the social health insurance system," published by the National Health Insurance House.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.
